text: James Todd Spader (born February 7, 1960) is an American actor. He is best known for his roles in Stargate (1994), Wolf (1994), Crash (1996), Secretary (2002), Boston Legal (2004) and The Blacklist (2013). He played Robert California in The Office. Spader was born in Boston, Massachusetts. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * James Spader at Emmys.com Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Boston Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors
title: James Spader
